snippet: Since we last checked in on the investor and one-time magazine subject Jeremy Grantham, his quarterly letter has appeared, and this time it isn't simply the American political-financial complex in his sights, but Capitalism itself.
abstract: Since we last checked in on the investor and one-time magazine subject Jeremy Grantham, his quarterly letter has appeared, and this time it isn't simply the American political-financial complex in his sights, but Capitalism itself.

headline.main: Now the Plutocrat Takes on Capitalism
